name: A Trip to the Bank
description:
I made this fun little game in Twine and I'm pretty proud of it. I know it is weird to ask a dollar for this but I worked really hard on it and even though it is smol it is mine and I do have a career I'm trying to develop. I appreciate u if you buy it, so much.

If you have any problems you can hunt me down on Twitter @grizner, just be polite and I'll do whatever I can to help u

It might work on Mac or Linux, I just have no guarantee as I've only tested it on Windows *~*

UPDATE: I patched a bug that someone pointed out with heading back to the Teller route after getting to the second phase. Thanks for the catch.
